SEARCH
Module ci553.happyshop
Package ci553.happyshop.catalogue

Class Order

java.lang.Object
ci553.happyshop.catalogue.Order
public class Order extends Object
The Order class represents a customer order, including metadata and a list of ordered products. Responsibilities: - sotres information about an order, including order ID, current order state, timestamps, and the list of products. - Provides getter methods for order attributes and allows updating the order state. - Formats the full order details for writing to a file, including timestamps and item list. An order file example: Order ID: 10 State: Ordered OrderedDateTime: 2025-05-03 16:52:24 ProgressingDateTime: CollectedDateTime: Items: 0002 DAB Radio ( 1) £ 29.99 0004 Watch ( 1) £ 29.99 0007 USB drive ( 1) £ 6.99 -------------------------------------------- Total £ 66.97 This class is mainly used by OrderHub to create and manage order objects during the order lifecycle (ordered → progressing → collected).
